text: The Fairfax Millions () is a 1980 Russian crime drama movie directed by Nikolai Ilinsky and based on the novel of the same name by Alan Winnington. It stars Juozas Budraitis, Juris Strenga, Gediminas Girdvanis, Galina Jovovich, Ivars Kalniņš, Yevgeny Vesnik, Helga Dantzberg and was distributed by Dovzhenko Film Studios. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1980 crime drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikolai Ilyinsky
title: The Fairfax Millions
